paper_abstract: In certain designed experiments a sum of independent Wilcoxon signed rank statistics can be used to establish preference between two competing resources. The statistic incorporates not only which resource was selected but also the order of selection. The test can be implemented using modem statistical packages. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Testing for preference using a sum of Wilcoxon signed rank statistics
